import React from 'react'; import styles from './WhyUs.module.scss'; import Button from '../../common/Button/Button'; const WhyUs = () => { return (
Why us?

Reach every single Arduino project you want

Imagination is your only limit

ArduRob is a perfect place to start if:

  • you want to buy some finished project to play in home
  • you are planning to build your own Arduino project from beginning
  • you already start some project and stuck with next steps

Or do you maybe miss some parts? For this check out our shop:

Are you still not sure?

Check how we work:
Constructing

You are good with wiring and coding but do not like to spend time on mechanical design? We prepare each construction from total zero. Choose parts you want to be used for your order.

Constructing

Electrical connection is your weakness? Or maybe you just do not like wire? Me can prepare all wiring, send it to you or connect directly with your solution if you send it for us. Choose controllers and sensors you want to be used for your order.

Constructing

If you can prepare full construction from beginning but you stuck in coding zone do not worry! We will write for you application for each construction you need. Send us data about parts you use and we will revive it with code.

...or do you want
); }; export default WhyUs;
